name: preprocesscanine
label: ldogStruct: anatomical pre-processing for the LDOG project
description: This gear performs preprocessing for the LDOG project.
author: Ozenc Taskin

centre_of_gravity_x.description: x position of the center voxel. If two structurals are used, obtain the coordinates from the first structural input (MPRAGE_01)

centre_of_gravity_y.description: y position of the center voxel. If two structurals are used, obtain the coordinates from the first structural input (MPRAGE_01)

centre_of_gravity_z.description: z position of the center voxel. If two structurals are used, obtain the coordinates from the first structural input (MPRAGE_01)

number_of_threads.description: Number of threads to use for registrations

struct_to_struct_transform.description: This is the transformation method to use for registering MPRAGE images together before averaging. If a single image is used as input, this config option will not be obtained by the gear as no registration will take place. SyN deformation is used as the default method, but rigid and affine transformations are also available for registering within subject structurals

Template.description: Template image to use for warping. This is optional. If left empty, the gear uses the invivoTemplate
